name: Disciple Tools - Maarifa
upgrade_notice: Automate sending updates for Maarifa-sourced contacts back to Maarifa site for reporting purposes.
author: cairocoder01

sections.description: Disciple Tools - Maarifa integrates the two platforms.
sections.installation:
(Required) You must have Disciple.Tools Theme installed before using this plugin.

Once Disciple.Tools is installed, you can use the normal Plugin system to install the plugin.
